name: Ducking Around (RokKos, MelsGames)
description:
Help momma duck find her little ducklings and take a family photo at the pond! Get your ducks in a row! :) A 3D adventure and exploration game.

download  it for better graphics 

Credits:

Developer - Ros Kos

Level Design - MelsGames

Character Design - Mateja G.

Music and Sound - Maja

Assets used for this game jam:

- Synty Samurai Pack   https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/polygon-samurai-pack-89551

- Wind Shader  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/low-poly-wind-182586

- Skybox https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-extended-shader-10...

- Duck Model - https://poly.google.com/view/6HpauUCfIAb
